amendment.description: Amendment establishes and provides financial assistance for exchange programs between Afghanistan and the United States for women legislators.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 24 printed in Part C of House Report 111-143 to establish and provide financial assistance for exchange programs between Afghanistan and the United States for women legislators.

action.text: Amendment (A023) offered by Ms. Johnson, E. B..

vote.text: On agreeing to the Johnson, E. B. amendment (A023) Agreed to by voice vote.
